reference_summary:
Embryolisse Eau de Beaute Rosamelis Face Toner, 6.76 Fl Oz {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.85 x 2.76 x 7.44 inches; 8.11 Ounces', 'Item model number': '501000', 'Manufacturer': 'Embryolisse'} I love that the toner is in a spray bottle. I wish the instructions were in A bit more clear. I do not know if you are supposed to spray it on your face and go or use a cotton pad. I do not feel a tightening on my skin like most toners. It leaves my skin soft and it smells wonderful! I have just been spraying it on my face after washing and I like that it’s easier, quicker and less waste when you don’t need a cotton pad. Quick, easy to apply -wonderful smelling toner! SENGOLOGY Water Flosser Professional Countertop Flosser Dental Oral Irrigator -Rechargeable 12 Modes Water Flossing with Cleanable Water Tank for Home, Braces & Bridges Care SENSOLOGY {'Brand': 'SENSOLOGY', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Special Feature': 'Portable, Multiple Operation Modes', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Tank Volume': '700 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '8.74 x 6.57 x 5.08 inches; 1.96 Pounds', 'UPC': '850004585177', 'Manufacturer': 'SENSOLOGY'} This is a good water flosser . I’m comparing it to others I have owned. The last one I had did not last long- this appears to be better made and it just looks nicer overall. The water well holds a fair amount of water however I would like it to hold a bit more. It has many levels of power for the water to spray out. The low is very weak and the high is pretty darn strong and could be painful if you aren’t careful. There are plenty of adjustments in between so you will find one that suits your mouth just right. It also has a “massage “ button which basically cuts down the strength of the jet and makes it pulse to massage your gums. I find it a bit too soft of my gums , even on the highest level. This product does a great job in cleaning between your teeth and below gum line. I hate to floss so this is a great option to keep my teeth clean and well cared for. If your house is Not new and only has one plug in your bathroom, you will appreciate the long cords- both the electrical and the water hose. One thing I like about this water flosser is that it does NOT leak like my other one did. This keeps my counter neat. This is a good product to add to your daily dental hygiene regimen . It is easy and does a great job cleaning .
* If you found this review helpful please click the button below to let Amazon know. Thanks ! Better than flossing or brushing alone! JDO Eyelash Curler and 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Value Set-Lash Curler with Refill Pads for No Pinching or Pulling, Mascara Natural Thickening- Long Lasting Waterproof & Smudge-Proof JDO {'Package Dimensions': '6 x 4 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} I was not impressed with this when I first received it. The package looked old and faded. However when I opened it and used the eyelash curler I was very impressed. The curler worked quickly and easily , it was comfortable and easy to use- my lashes curled well with one squeeze. It comes with two extra pads for the curler. The mascara wand is small and is able to get every lash. I was told the mascara makes my lashes look very natural- of clumpy. The mascara really lengthened my lashes. Long, curled lashes- very natural. Face Lift Tapes for Instant Face, Neck and Eye Lift Kit Tape C CRYSTAL LEMON {'Brand': 'C CRYSTAL LEMON', 'Unit Count': '40.00 Count', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 3.35 x 0.87 inches; 0.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '725330346603'} I tried these strips and they did not stick well, they popped off so I REALLY my face and put toner on and they still popped off. Not a big fan of this product. Not great Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant - No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Solid Deodorant Featuring Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Lavender) PRETTY FRANK {'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Scent': 'Lavender, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5.87 x 5.12 x 1.14 inches; 4.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'DSF-BS-LAV'} This deodorant goes on smooth. It has a full lavender scent. It's deodorant qualities are good. the product controls odors all day. I find it non irritating and happy it doesn't have aluminum in it. Pleasant scent 36 Pack 2oz Clear Plastic Empty Bottles Travel Containers with Flip Cap for Hand Sanitizer, Cosmetic, Shampoo, Lotion, Liquid Body Soap, Cream, Toner, BPA-free JIUZHU {'Package Dimensions': '12.09 x 10.28 x 3.07 inches; 13.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '667322945817'} This set of fillable bottles is good quality. I put hand sanitizer in them and they did not leak. They are easy to squeeze and I like the flip top. The 2 oz size is perfect for a weekend away for toiletries. Good quality Aloe Hand Sanitizer 24 Pack Dearskin Aloe Vera Moisturizing Alcohol 75% Gel 2 Fl Oz/60ml Skin Care Natural Advanced Formula Alcohol Refreshing Moisturizing with Argine. Dearskin ['24 Pack Dearskin Hand Sanitizer 60ml, 2 Fl Oz', 'Dearskin Hand sanitizer Kills 99.9% of the most common germs!', '- Clean and Refreshing Moisturizing;', '- Long-Lasting Antibacterial;', '- Easy to use, hard to waste; -', '75% Alcohol;', 'Drug Facts: Active ingredients: - Alcohol 75% v/v. Antiseptic. Use: Hand sanitizer to help reduce bacteria that potentially can cause disease. For use when soap and water are not available. For external use only. Flammable. Keep away from or flame. Do not use: - In children less than 2 months of age. - On open skin wounds. When using this product keep out of eyes, and mouth. In case of contact with eyes, rinse eyes thoroughly with water. Stop use and ask a doctor if irritation or rash occurs. These may be sings of a serious condition. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away. Directions: - Place enough product on hands to cover all surfaces. Rub hands together until dry. - Supervise children under 6 years of age when use this product to avoid swallowing. Other information: Store between 15-30C (59-86F). Avoid freezing and excessive heat above 40C (104F). Inactive ingredients: Deionized Water, Aloe Barbadensis Extract, Carbomer, Arginine. Distributed by: Dearskin LLC, FL.'] {'Brand': 'Dearskin', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '24', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals, Travel Size, Moisturizer', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 4 x 4 inches; 2.36 Ounces', 'UPC': '850005863359', 'Manufacturer': 'Dearskin'} Great size for purse or travel. Nice that it has a flip top for ease of use. This dries fairly quickly on your hands it’s a nice gel consistency however I’m not so fond of the smell it’s not bad it’s just not a pretty smell. But men would probably be happy it doesn’t have a feminine smell. It’s hard to describe it kind of smells like a plant or something. Not bad just different . Does not leave my hands sticky - I actually like how my hands feel after using it . Great for travel. Leaves hand feeling soft . Nail Clipper Set, GIDIBII Luxury 18 in 1 Stainless Steel Nail Clipper Kit, Manicure Pedicure Care Tools with Portable Travel Case GIDIBII {'Brand': 'GIDIBII', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.8 x 3.8 x 0.8 inches', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.8 x 3.8 x 0.8 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Manicure Set', 'UPC': '799445199218', 'Manufacturer': 'GIDIBII'} This is a complete set for doing manicures or pedicures and even a couple for extra things like maybe for your face. All the tools are strong amd sturdy. The case unfortunately is not as strong. The straps that hold the implements in the case are weak and thin and one broke right away. Overall a good set they definitely thought of everything to include in the kit. Great selection of implements. Fog-free Dental Mirror and 4 Pieces of Stainless Steel Dental Pick Professional Oral Care Kit for Family including Dogs Oral Care Sunrise glow {'Package Dimensions': '8.15 x 2.4 x 1.3 inches; 4.23 Ounces'} High quality tools, just like your dentist uses. They come with a storage bag and also a a nice cardboard tube. High quality tools,
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to prioritize skincare and personal care products that are user-friendly, effective, and natural. Their recent acquisition of a comprehensive oral care kit highlights a growing interest in multifaceted personal care tools, emphasizing convenience alongside thoroughness in grooming routines.

- **Application Method:** A preference for practical, easy-to-use formats remains evident, as shown in their choice of high-quality dental tools designed for effective family oral care. This aligns with their ongoing desire for reliable products that deliver performance without complication.

- **Sensory Experience:** The user values pleasant, natural scents, yet shows adaptability with neutral or plant-like aromas. They maintain an emphasis on effectiveness, suggesting a focus on functionality over complexity in fragrance.

- **Skin Feel and Efficacy:** The user is dedicated to products that ensure a positive user experience while delivering results. Their appreciation for the sturdiness and functionality of selected tools illustrates a preference for durability and practicality in both skincare and oral care products.

- **Desire for Clarity and Ease of Use:** The user appreciates straightforward instructions and efficient application methods, reinforcing their commitment to practicality and reliability in personal care. Their latest purchase reflects a holistic approach to grooming, expanding this ethos into oral hygiene.

Overall, the user's evolving profile showcases an increased emphasis on comprehensive personal care solutions, prioritizing convenience, effectiveness, and user-friendliness across various product categories.
